Interface TemplateCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTemplateCache

    public interface TemplateCache
    Template caching interface
    Author:
    kdubb

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TemplateCache.CachedTemplate
      Template cache entry

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemplateCache.CachedTemplate get(URI uri)
      Get a cached version of the template for the given URI
      void remove(URI uri)
      Removes the cached template for the given cache URI key
      TemplateCache.CachedTemplate update(URI uri, TemplateCache.CachedTemplate cachedTemplate)
      Updates the cache at the given URI key with a new cached template

    • Method Detail

      • get

        TemplateCache.CachedTemplate get(URI uri)
        Get a cached version of the template for the given URI
        Parameters:
        uri - Absolute URI of cached template to retrieve
        Returns:
        Cached version of the template associated with the given URI

      • update

        TemplateCache.CachedTemplate update(URI uri,
                                  TemplateCache.CachedTemplate cachedTemplate)
        Updates the cache at the given URI key with a new cached template
        Parameters:
        uri - Absolute URI as cache key
        cachedTemplate - New template information to use as cache entry
        Returns:
        Old cache entry

      • remove

        void remove(URI uri)
        Removes the cached template for the given cache URI key
        Parameters:
        uri - Absolute URI as cache key
